amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before any short title), insert the following new section: The amount otherwise provided by this Act for "Agricultural Programs, Animal and Plant Health Inspection Service, Salaries and Expenses" is hereby reduced by $11,000,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the amount of funds provided by this bill for "Agricultural Programs, Animal and Plant Health Inspection Service, Salaries and Expenses" by $11,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Campbell amendment (A053) Failed by recorded vote: 132 - 287 (Roll no. 452).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Campbell amendment (A053) Failed by recorded vote: 132 - 287 (Roll no. 452).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A053) offered by Mr. Campbell.
